notes: Bharat was Raja of Hastinapur. His mother was Shakuntala. He has 9 sons. He selected Abhimanyu as Yuvraj not his real sons.
He met with ganga putri Ganga &  felt in love. Ganga asked for a vachan that he will never counter question her for anything. He had given this vachan &  got married.

Ganga continuously drawned her 7 sons in river ganga. On 8th son, shantanu stopped her. She has told about the curse given by her father Brahmaji. She went with 8th son Devduth &  promised to return at the right time.
Ganga returned his son after 16 yrs.
Raja Shantanu declared Devduth as Yuvraj after the first war won by Devduth.

subtopic: Shantanu met Satyavati near river Ganga.
notes: Shantanu met with her father Dasraj for marrying her.

subtopic: Dasraj kept condition for Yuvraj of their sons.
notes: Shantanu disagreed condition as he already declared Devduth as Yuvraj.
He said he will give his will not become raja &he will remain childless till death.
Shantanu & Satyavati becomes parent of two twins son.
